pageContext.claim: “The already discredited Woodward book, so many lies and phony sources, has me calling Jeff Sessions “mentally retarded” and “a dumb southerner.” I said NEITHER, never used those terms on anyone, including Jeff, and being a southerner is a GREAT thing. He made this up to divide!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has a history of using the word "retarded" to describe people who bother him, including at least twice on the Howard Stern Show.
